i go to a catholic high school in new england.
I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset.

participant_2.background:
I lost my dog a few years ago, and I still miss him every day.
i work at mcdonald s.
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.

i m a mom with two sons and a husband.

content.text: Hey, I am a student at a Catholic high school in New England.
Oh cool! I work at McDonald's and I'm a mom of two sons and a husband.
That is a lot of responsibility! How do you balance it all?
It's not easy, but I try my best. I have a lot of support from my family and friends.
That's good to hear. I'm afraid I'm not as good at balancing things.
I'm afraid I'm not reaching my full potential. I want to be a pharmacist, but I'm not sure if I'm smart enough.
You're smart enough! You just have to work hard and never give up on your dreams.
Thank you, I needed to hear that.
You're welcome. What's your favorite time of day?
My favorite time of day is sunset. It's so peaceful and beautiful.
I love sunsets too! They're so relaxing.
I had a dog, but I lost him a few years ago. I still miss him every day.
I'm sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I lost my cat a few years ago too.
It's hard to lose a pet. They're like family.
They really are. I'm glad we have each other to talk to.
